sentences.en: Dr. York is a professor of art. In addition, he is a television commentator.
sentences.cn: 约克博士是一位艺术教授,此外, 他还是一位电视评论家.

sentences.en: He is a good commentator because he can get across the game.
sentences.cn: 他能简单地解说这场比赛,是个好的解说者.

sentences.en: I prefer soccer commentator to report a match blow by blow.
sentences.cn: 我宁愿足球比赛广播实况播音员详尽地报导比赛.

sentences.en: Instead of deciding the real issue the commentator would chop logic.
sentences.cn: 这位评论家不去解决实质问题,而总是咬文嚼字.

sentences.en: Our commentator will now set the scene in the stadium.
sentences.cn: 讲解员现在就要在体育场向我们报道.

sentences.en: Regular commentator Bill Thompson extols the virtues of a 3 G card for his laptop computer.
sentences.cn: 一般的讲评者比尔汤普生为他的笔记型电脑颂杨3G卡的德行.

sentences.en: She eliminated the author as narrator or commentator.
sentences.cn: 在她的小说里,缩小作者作为叙述者或评论者的作用.

sentences.en: She is invited to be a commentator for that show.
sentences.cn: 她被邀请去做展览的讲解员.

sentences.en: The commentator and the announcer are both for the Giant.
sentences.cn: 解说员和播报员都偏爱巨人队.

sentences.en: The commentator generalized because he knew no details.
sentences.cn: 讲评者只是泛论,因为他不知细节.

sentences.en: The fifth - century commentator Proclus was very explicit about his objection to the parallel axiom.
sentences.cn: 第五世纪评论家Proclus非常明显地反对平行公理.

sentences.en: The news commentator analyzed the situation with reservation.
sentences.cn: 新闻评述员有所保留地分析了那情况.

sentences.en: The point is that the age of the commentator is all important in such matters.
sentences.cn: 关键之处是,在这类事情中发表自己意见的人的年龄非常重要.

sentences.en: This commentator claims Mt Sinai is in Arabia and is where Moses saw the burning bush.
sentences.cn: 这个评论家宣称西乃山是在亚拉伯,摩西是在这里看见燃烧着的荆棘.

sentences.en: We'll invite you to be the commentator when we watch a motor race later.
sentences.cn: 以后看摩托车比赛,我们就请你做讲解员.

words.tran_cn: 评论员，解说员；实况播音员；时事评论者

trans.tran_en: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, and who writes about it or discusses it on the television or radio
